content:
Guellwasser family

1 Samuel Josua GUELLWASSER           c1765 - Jan 14, 1842 #10  {census family 385}
 + Scheindel Elias                   c1767 - 1849 #46
  2o Reichel Lea GUELLWASSER         c1793
    * Samson Lipman HOLLAU           1787-88 - 1846 #180
     3o Natel HOLLAU                 1811 #123a
     3o Maria HOLLAU                 1813 #33

             married 1831 #7

       + Freindla KLINGBERG          1819 #215 - 1835 #368 (Hillel+Kruszy Lemel)

       + Feigla SPIRA                Jun 10, 1815 #50 (Salomon+Frumet Szmul GUELLWASSER)
             married Aug 24, 1838 #48

                   married Feb 16, 1911 #113
